# Deadly Accuracy (Ex)
## Overview
*Deadly Accuracy (Ex)*: If the barbarian scores a critical threat when using her [[Surprise Accuracy (Ex)|surprise accuracy]] rage power, she applies double the surprise accuracy bonus when rolling to confirm the critical. A barbarian must have the [[Surprise Accuracy (Ex)|surprise accuracy]] rage power and be at least 4th level before selecting this rage power.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 26
